data.name: TS Marketplace: U34CH Early Years Livery Pack
data.detailed_description:
Required DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1211475


About the Game

Step back in time to the origins of the distinctive, burly, and powerful U34CH diesel that toted commuters for more than two decades, with the Early Years livery pack!

A product of urgent equipment renewal, the U34CH was ordered in the 1970s for use out of Hoboken Terminal and out into the suburbs of New Jersey. Accompanying the behemoth locomotive was a fleet of Pullman-Standard Comet I commuter equipment, constructed in cab car and coach configurations for “push-pull” service.

Now sporting their distinctive early liveries in Train Simulator, carry out many passenger services out of Hoboken with the U34CH Early Years Livery Pack!

Please Note: NJ TRANSIT® U34CH Loco Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 40 GB HD space
  • Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
